The three Philosophies are: (1) Dignity: A society that has respect for human dignity, (2) Diversity and Inclusion: A society where people with diverse backgrounds can pursue their own well-being, and (3) Sustainability: A sustainable society. This guideline serves as a guardrail to boost the use of generative AI, aiming to achieve steady evolution of safe and secure use of generative AI by the Japanese Government, thereby realizing benefits such as: 1. Efficient and effective achievement of administrative objectives 2. Enhanced planning capabilities 3. Enhanced information gathering and analysis capabilities 4.
